title: Cant connect to server
body:
So i played about 8~9 hours ago without any problems but now i can't seem to connect to pvp server 
HELP {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Are you still able to connect to the gaming server? That is, are you able to create a custom game and join that?

If that's the case, then a quick fix might be to just [change your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) (respective of what OS you're on, of course). What ISP and OS are you using?
so i have tried restarting, flushing dns, trying the repair tab on the launcher but still not working
